english_example_sentence: You would have seemed very happy in the garden of that old house.
russian_example_sentence: Вы бы казались очень счастливыми в саду того старого дома.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz, o eski evin bahçesinde çok mutlu görünecektiniz.
